characters.name: Ja-Hyeon Jo
characters.description:
__Place of Birth:__ Incheon, South Korea
__Affiliation:__ Humming Bird Crew 
__Height:__ 178cm 

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ja_hyuni/)

Ja-Hyeon is a member and ace of the Hummingbird Crew and a junior at Sunny High School.

He usually assumes a serious and emotionless expression. He appears cold hearted, but very much so cares about the friends he has and his little brother. His minimal expression of emotion doesn't allow him to articulate his feelings very well, but sometimes his few words mean a lot.

Ja-Hyeon is a well rounded cyclist. Throughout the competition, he is acknowledged as the ace of the crew. He is able to play as a defensive rider, supporting his crew during their races, as well as a offensive rider. Vinny noted that he enjoyed the "hunt" of attacking from the back.

His debut in the League of Street preliminaries helped him gain popularity in the biking scene in Korea and at his school.

characters.name: Min-U Yoon
characters.description:
__Height:__ 180 cm
__Affiliation:__ Humming Bird Crew

Minu is quite a simple and good guy. He is loyal to his words and his friends and seems to be a rather pure guy. When people provoke him he most likely falls for it since he is very emotional and impulsive. Furthermore he is really tough and can endure some pain.
He is quick to anger when someone he cherishes is threatened.

~!He gets run over by a car from a member of Team Scorpion while trying to protect Jay. He remains crippled in a wheelchair from this accident.!~

characters.name: Yu-Bin Hong
characters.description:
~!Vinny Hong is a student at Gunn High and the current leader of the Sabbath Crew.He was previously a member of the Zephyrus Crew along with Minu and June, the Hummingbird Crew, and the Ghost Crew..!~

He cares deeply about his mom and does not tolerate anyone who disrespects his mother, not even her self-deprecation.
His childhood sweetness does make an appearance once in a while. He displays a great deal of empathy, even while displaying it through hardened words.

Yu-Bin has a condition called Waardenburg syndrome which caused the color of his left eye and hair.

One of the few things Vinny is proficient at in cooking is Ramen. He often cooks a pot for his friends voluntarily and involuntarily.

characters.name: Shelly
characters.description:
__Height:__ 163 cm
__Place of birth:__ Manchester, England
__Affiliation:__ Humming Bird Crew

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/shelly_______x/)

Shelly has a crush on Jay. She is the only female member of the Humming Bird Crew.

Because she stayed at England before coming to Korea her personality is perceived as very headstrong. She does not like it when people talk badly about her friends, especially Jay. Described as someone who can confidently express her thoughts and feelings. Although her words are harsh, it is because she never sugar coated her words with her friends. And with Jay, Shelly is very clingy and flirtatious.

characters.name: Han-Nam Kang
characters.description:
__Height:__ 188 cm
__Affiliation:__ Humming Bird Crew

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/hannam_x_jordan/)

Dom is a Junior at Sunny High School. He is the son of a gang leader. He is interested in making music in the future and works part-time as a DJ at his father's club, WD Club. He is quite the sneakerhead and spends his money on his collection.
Dom is caring towards his friends and others and does his best to get involved.

Dom is very good at sprinting and riding on straight distances. He is also good at hand-to-hand combat and wrestling

characters.name: Owen Knight
characters.description:
__Height:__ 193 cm
__Place of birth:__ Manchester, England
__Affiliation:__ Light Cavalry Crew

Owen Knight is the creator and member of Light Cavalry cyclist team. He joined Sunny High to stay closer with his childhood friend [Shelly](https://anilist.co/character/140299/Shelly) and fend off her feelings for [Jay](https://anilist.co/character/137282/JaHyeon-Jo).

Owen Knight is said to be close to the crews who spread street riding culture In New York. He was said to have followed them around and became friends with their members and cycled together. Then, in his freshman year of high school, he went back to England and formed a world-famous crew with his athlete friends called Light Cavalry.

characters.name: Monster13
characters.description:
__Height:__ 205 cm
__Place of birth:__ Jung-gu-, Seoul
__Affiliation:__ Monster Crew

Monster, is one of the favourites in the "League of Street" competition. He is the leader of Monster Crew. His team is expected to win the competition due to their raw power and speed.

He is an honest and fair cyclist who is dedicated to the sport. It is seen and mentioned that he works out all the time apart from sleeping and eating, he is addicted to working out and becoming a better version of himself. And he's seen sleeping in classes and only bringing workout tools in his backpack, he uses every opportunity to work out even when his teacher calls him out to the back he would use the chance to do squats while the classes continue.

characters.name: Joker
characters.description:
__Height:__ 201 cm
__Affiliation__: Sabbath Crew 

He's the undefeated champion in the underground cage fights scene. He seems to be doing it for the money to take care of his family. It is unknown how many siblings he has or if their parents are around but we know he has at least one younger brother, who went behind Joker's back to work at a construction site. He is protective over them, not wanting them to work, assumably in order for them to focus on getting their education.

He's mostly shown working closely with Wooin and are often seen together. It is assumed that they are good friends.

characters.name: Jun-Su Lee
characters.description:
__Height:__ 180 cm
__Affiliation:__ Humming Bird Crew

June is one of the more level-headed members of the Humming Bird Crew. He is generally polite and kind, and does not fight as much as the others. However, he will always support his friends.
He sometimes feels as if he is useless, especially when he couldn't lead the team. He feels like a deadweight to the crew, not able to contribute to the success of the team, but he works just as hard as everyone else during training to be more useful to the team.

characters.name: Seung-Chun Nam
characters.description:
Works at Sunny High as a gym teacher.

~!Later on it is revealed that he is Ricardo Rossi, former pro cyclist.!~

characters.name: A-Ran Choi
characters.description:
Currently a junior at Sunny High.

~!She is in love with Jay and has even thought of marrying him.!~

characters.name: U-In Yu
characters.description:
__Place of Birth__: Dong-gu, South Korea
__Affiliation__: Sabbath Crew 

U-In is a member of the Sabbath Crew and is currently under the employment of Sang-Ho. He, along with the rest of his crew, aim to sabotage Team Hummingbird's chances of progressing through the League of Street Competition.
